subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goaltender Martin Brodeur tied Patrick Roy’s N.H.L. career record of 551 victories Saturday night when he led the visiting Devils to a 3-1 victory over the Montreal Canadiens.
snippet: Goaltender Martin Brodeur tied Patrick Roy’s N.H.L. career record of 551 victories Saturday night when he led the visiting Devils to a 3-1 victory over the Montreal Canadiens.
